  • Constructor Details

    • Pawn

      public Pawn​(PlayerColour colour, int pawnNum)
      Parameters:
      colour - - the 'type' of the team, from enum TeamType used to get team info and calculate position
      pawnNum - - the number of the pawn, acts as an id and is used to determine initial board position
